title: Possession Planning System Document
description: This contains all fields for Possession Planning System Document

$oid.description: Unique internal ID which is automatically assigned by MongoDB.

_version.description: Version number that automatically increments each time this document changes.

ppsRef.title: Reference Number
ppsRef.description: Business Reference for the WON Item - allocated at T35-Weeks (DPPP)

disruptiveClassification.title: Classification
disruptiveClassification.description: Shows the impact on the Working TimeTable (WTT)

generalRemarks.title: General Remarks tbc
generalRemarks.description: Remarks used by many to quote lines blocked, protecting Signals etc/ref #'s etc
examples:
ECM-ALL-WER-STO-OTM

NOT TO PASS P500 P502 WITHOUT THE SIGNALLERS PERMISSION

protectionLimits.title: Protection Limits
protectionLimits.description: In some routes they quote specifically how the lines are blocked
examples:
2300 Thu to 0055 Fri
Down Fast: P1271Apts to P615
Up Fast: P1316pts to P1272Apts

0055 Fri to 0550 Fri
Down Fast: P1271Apts to P615
Up Fast: P1316pts to P1272Apts
Down Slow: P1281pts to P613
Up Slow: P1316pts to P1273pts

isolations.title: Isolations
isolations.description: Indicates where electrified lines have been isolated before work takes place

trafficRemarks.title: Traffic Remarks
trafficRemarks.description: Alterations to running traffic to accommodate the Possession
examples:
TRAINS TO BE RETIMED OVER THE SLOWS LINES BETWEEN HOLLOWAY AND WOOD GREEN NORTH/ NEW SOUTHGATE

ACCESS TO FERME PARK MUST BE AVAILABLE VIA THE DOWN SLOW 2 OR DOWN GOODS)

possessionManager.title: Possession Manager
possessionManager.description: Role or Function who is responsible for the Possession

startTime.title: Star Time
startTime.description: Minimum date/time of the blocked lines

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: Maximum date/time of the blocked lines
